summary: Tested VibeRooms removal and Resources page replacement. Fixed a bug in Resources.js where API response format was incorrect. All features working correctly - Home page loads, Resources page shows free resources with search/filters, Tribes page loads, Tutorial reduced to 7 steps without VibeRooms/VibeZone mentions.

fixed_issues.issue: API response format mismatch - expected array but got {products: [...]}
fixed_issues.fix: Updated fetchResources to extract products array from response

critical_code_review_comments: VibeRooms completely removed from navigation, routes, and tutorial
Resources page now correctly fetches from /api/digital-products and filters free resources
Tutorial reduced from 8 to 7 steps - VibeZone step removed
Bottom navigation shows: Home, Tribes, Resources, Discover, Profile
Backend routes properly wired via set_database(db) in server.py line 80-81
context_for_next_testing_agent: VibeRooms has been completely removed. Resources page replaces Rooms in navigation. Tutorial has 7 steps (Welcome, Home Feed, Tribes, Projects, Free Resources, Messenger, Stories & Profile). Backend routes are modular in /app/backend/routes/ and wired via set_database(db). delivery_service runs in MOCK mode.

features_tested.resources_page: PASSED - Shows free resources with search and category filters
features_tested.tribes_page: PASSED - Shows tribes list with join/leave functionality
features_tested.bottom_navigation: PASSED - Shows Home, Tribes, Resources, Discover, Profile (no Rooms)
features_tested.reels_api: PASSED - Returns reels with author info
features_tested.capsules_api: PASSED - Returns stories grouped by author
features_tested.posts_api: PASSED - Returns posts with author info
features_tested.digital_products_api: PASSED - Returns products with total count

mocked_apis.delivery_service: Running in MOCK mode (no API keys)
